original: por bstan pa'o //
analyzed: por bstan pa'o //
translated: Then means immediately after and auspiciously, it is taught at the beginning of the treatise.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs zhes pa 'di yang khyad par du byed //üîΩyang dag par zhes pa ni yang dag par phye nas so //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs zhes pa 'di yang khyad par du byed // yang dag par zhes pa ni yang dag par phye nas so //
translated: The word sƒÅdhana here is also used to distinguish it.üîΩCorrectly means having analyzed correctly.

original: rab ces pa ni rab tu bsams nas so //
analyzed: rab ces pa ni rab tu bsams nas so //
translated: Thoroughly means having thoroughly contemplated.

original: bshad ces pa ni /
analyzed: bshad ces pa ni /
translated: Explained means that the meaning of the tantra is explained.

original: yongs brjod yang dag rab bshad bya //
analyzed: yongs brjod yang dag rab bshad bya //
translated: Vajra-dhara is the Vajra-holder, and he is the one who is to be explained.

original: zhes bya'o // rdo rje ni shes rab nyid kyi phyir dang ; thabs nyid kyi phyir na 'jigs byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // rdo rje ni shes rab nyid kyi phyir dang ; thabs nyid kyi phyir na 'jigs byed do //
translated: The Vajra is wisdom itself and method itself, and it is a ‚Äúdhara‚Äù because it terrifies.

original: de yang shin tu drag po'i lha thams cad 'jigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang shin tu drag po'i lha thams cad 'jigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And it is terrifying because it terrifies all the gods who are extremely fierce.

original: de yang snying rje 'bras bu nyid de /
analyzed: de yang snying rje 'bras bu nyid de /
translated: And that is the fruit of compassion,

original: gang du gdug pa'i sems can rnams la snying rjes 'dul ma yin //
analyzed: gang du gdug pa'i sems can rnams la snying rjes 'dul ma yin //
translated: whereby the fierce beings are not disciplined by compassion.

original: gang phyir zhi ba'i yon tan gyis ni 'dul ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang phyir zhi ba'i yon tan gyis ni 'dul ba ma yin te /
translated: Because they are not disciplined by the virtues of peace,

original: de'i phyir rdo rje can de 'jigs byed yang dag gyur //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje can de 'jigs byed yang dag gyur //
translated: therefore the Vajra-holder becomes a true terrifyer.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan byas thod pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan byas thod pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: He is adorned with a garland of skulls and holds a skull-cup.

original: nyi 'od khros pa'i rdzing bu che //
analyzed: nyi 'od khros pa'i rdzing bu che //
translated: He is the great lake of the wrathful sun‚Äôs light.

original: mtshungs pa'i sku ni rdo rje khro //
analyzed: mtshungs pa'i sku ni rdo rje khro //
translated: His body is equal to the wrathful vajra.

original: gangs kyi kha ba bzhin du bsil //
analyzed: gangs kyi kha ba bzhin du bsil //
translated: He is cool like snow and ice.

original: phyi rol drag pos 'gro ba skyongs //
analyzed: phyi rol drag pos 'gro ba skyongs //
translated: He protects the world with external fierceness.

original: zhes rdo rje can gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes rdo rje can gyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus spoke the Vajra-holder.

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed ces pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i don dam pa byang chub kyi sems te bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs byed ces pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i don dam pa byang chub kyi sems te bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Vajrabhairava is the ultimate thought of enlightenment, the meaning of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion, the glorious Bhagavat Vajradhara.

original: de'i grub pa ni sgrub thabs te 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de'i grub pa ni sgrub thabs te 'bras bu'o //
translated: His accomplishment is the means of achievement, the result.

original: 'dis sgrub par byed pas na lam yang ngo //
analyzed: 'dis sgrub par byed pas na lam yang ngo //
translated: Since it is that by which one achieves, it is also the path.

original: rang dga' 'jigs byed la sogs pa thams cad kun na ni gzhan rtog la sogs pa la rol pas na lha yin no //
analyzed: rang dga' 'jigs byed la sogs pa thams cad kun na ni gzhan rtog la sogs pa la rol pas na lha yin no //
translated: All of them, such as the self-delighting Bhairava, are gods because they sport in the imagination of others.

original: de kun kyang shin tu drag po ste thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: de kun kyang shin tu drag po ste thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: All of them are also very fierce, overpowering everything.

original: de nas 'jigs par byed pas na 'jigs byed do /
analyzed: de nas 'jigs par byed pas na 'jigs byed do /
translated: Then, because they frighten, they are Bhairavas.

original: des ni 'di ltar ston te 'jigs byed ces bya'o //
analyzed: des ni 'di ltar ston te 'jigs byed ces bya'o //
translated: Thus, it is taught like this: ‚ÄúBhairava.‚Äù

original: yang dag pa'i gsung rab ni rjod byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i gsung rab ni rjod byed do //
translated: The true scriptures are the means of expression.

original: de gnyis brjod bya rjod byed kyi ngo bo ni 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: de gnyis brjod bya rjod byed kyi ngo bo ni 'brel ba'o //
translated: The essence of those two as the expressed and the means of expression is the connection.

original: dngos grub ni dgos pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni dgos pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment is the purpose.

original: de'i sgrub thabs dang lam ni thabs so //
analyzed: de'i sgrub thabs dang lam ni thabs so //
translated: The means of achieving that and the path are the means.

original: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni shin tu drag po'i lha thams cad 'jigs pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni shin tu drag po'i lha thams cad 'jigs pa bskyed pa'o //

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs ni sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs ni sgrub pa ste /
translated: The means of achieving Vajrabhairava is the practice.

original: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //

original: de yang gnyis te /
analyzed: de yang gnyis te /

original: rtog pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //

original: dang po ni ji snyed mngon par byang chub par bya ba byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: dang po ni ji snyed mngon par byang chub par bya ba byang chub pa'o //
translated: The first is the realization of all that is to be fully enlightened.

original: gnyis pa yang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus pa spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa yang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus pa spangs pa'o //

original: de'i thabs ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam mo //
analyzed: de'i thabs ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam mo //
translated: The means of that is the path of the means of practice.

original: de'i @133b yang thabs ni gsung rab bo //
analyzed: de'i @133b yang thabs ni gsung rab bo //
translated: The means of that is the scriptures.

original: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ni gdug pa can 'jigs par byed pa'o //üîΩde'i thabs ni sgrub thabs so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa ni gdug pa can 'jigs par byed pa'o // de'i thabs ni sgrub thabs so //
translated: The perfection of others' aims is to generate fear in the fierce ones.üîΩThe means of that is the means of practice.

original: de'i yang thabs ni gsung rab nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i yang thabs ni gsung rab nyid yin no //

original: sdud pa po gang yin pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid du rnam pa mang pos gsungs mod kyi /
analyzed: sdud pa po gang yin pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid du rnam pa mang pos gsungs mod kyi /

analyzed: 'dir ni gnas skabs yin no ;

analyzed: gang yang gnas mang po'i ming yod kyang //

analyzed: de lta na yang la la gcig tu'o //

original: de la yang gang dang gang nga ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la yang gang dang gang nga ni ma yin te /

analyzed: 'di nyid ni 'jam dpal rgyud chen por gsungs pa'o //
translated: This very [place] is taught in the Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´-mahƒÅ-tantra.

original: 'on kyang yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su'o //

analyzed: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas zhes pas go bar bya'o //

analyzed: de'i ni ched du'o //

original: shing gcig ni shin gzhan gyi grib mas ma reg pa'o //

analyzed: /'thab mo yis ni g-yul ngo gang du dmag mi mang po shi ba'o //

analyzed: shar dang / dbang ldan dang / lho dang me'o //

original: ro langs ni ro'o //
analyzed: ro langs ni ro'o //

original: ces pas so //
analyzed: ces pas so //

original: de rnams ni kun no //
analyzed: de rnams ni kun no //

original: bar chad ni glags tshol ba'o //
analyzed: bar chad ni glags tshol ba'o //

original: skyes pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa ni rnyed pa'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir 'jigs pa med pas so //

original: ces bya bas gshin rje gshed po'i sngags gsungs pa'o //

original: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo'i phar rol gnyi ga'i chu ngogs kyi sa'o //
analyzed: rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo'i phar rol gnyi ga'i chu ngogs kyi sa'o //

original: gong du gsungs pa de nyid kyis so //
